long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing ApolloAI Browser extension - the game-changing browser extension that brings the power of AI right to your fingertips! Whether you're a student, a professional, or simply seeking to enhance your productivity, our innovative tool is designed to revolutionize the way you interact with text.

With ApolloAI, you can now access AI inside any textbox by simply typing a few characters. Just type "/ap (your prompt)/" and watch as our cutting-edge technology comprehends your needs and generates accurate and valuable suggestions. Say goodbye to the days of struggling with writer's block or second-guessing your writing skills. ApolloAI is here to provide instant inspiration and elevate your work to new heights.

But that's not all - ApolloAI goes above and beyond by supporting custom commands. Tailor the AI's responses to align precisely with your preferences and style. With just a few clicks, you can fine-tune the AI's output, create templates, or even add personalized instructions. It's like having a friendly writing assistant who adapts exclusively to you!


A full tutorial is available here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VMHg-31NPuw
